thread_title: Server Stats - An open Source Bot

messages.raw_content:
üéØ What is Server Stats ?

Server Stats Bot is a free, open-source, and fully automated Discord bot that displays live server metrics in voice channels. Whether you manage a gaming community, a development hub, or a support server, this bot gives your members a clear view of your server‚Äôs activity ‚Äî without lifting a finger.

üí° Key Features:

‚úÖ Completely Free ‚Äì No paywalls, subscriptions, or premium upsells. Everything is yours from day one.
‚úÖ Open Source ‚Äì Built by the community, for the community. Modify it, contribute to it, or just enjoy it.
‚úÖ Real-Time Updates ‚Äì Channels auto-update on user join, bot join, role creation, and version changes.
‚úÖ Set It and Forget It ‚Äì Once installed, the bot handles everything in the background ‚Äî no commands needed.
‚úÖ Clean Design ‚Äì Stats are shown in read-only voice channels under a dedicated "Server Stats" category ‚Äî visible to all, usable by none.

üìä Displays:
- Members: Total number of human users
- Bots: Number of bots in your server
- Roles: Count of all server roles
- Version: Automatically Updated

üì¶ Get Started:

Setting up the bot is simple and fast. Just head to the GitHub repository and follow the clear instructions:
üëâ [Server Stats on GitHub](https://github.com/Pontikaki34/Server-Stats-Discord-Bot)

üîß Make It Your Own:

Want to tweak how it works? Go ahead! The code is yours to explore and customize. Whether you're an admin looking to brand your server or a developer who wants to expand the features ‚Äî Server Stats  gives you the freedom to build.

This powerful bot is your all-in-one solution for a thriving Discord server! üöÄ

Here's how it elevates your community:

üéÆ Games & Fun: Keep members entertained with built-in activities and engaging experiences.

üõ°Ô∏è Moderation: Maintain a clean, organized, and positive environment with robust management tools.

üîí Anti-Nuke Features: Offering a higher level of security than the average bot, this feature requires the bot to be placed in a higher role within your server's hierarchy. This crucial placement enables it to actively defend against "nuke" attempts by kicking or banning malicious bots/users and protecting your community.

It's the ultimate tool for a fun, safe, and resilient Discord community! ‚ú®
# [Link To Invite](https://discord.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=1395479887309045922&permissions=8&integration_type=0&scope=bot+applications.commands)

**Synz ModMail Bot** ‚Äì Modern, Private Support for Your Discord Community

Empower your server with a professional ModMail system, making support easy, private, and efficient for both users and staff.

‚ú® **Features:**
* Secure, private modmail sessions between users and staff
* Slash command support for easy configuration and management
* Button and modal interactions for a modern Discord experience
* Persistent session tracking and planned transcript saving
* Customizable embeds and logging for a professional look

**Made by:** [Synz](https://synz.xyz/)

**Required Permissions:**
* Manage Channels
* Manage Roles
* Send Messages
* Read Message History
* Embed Links

**Note:**  
This is an open-source ModMail bot designed to be self-hosted and used in a single Discord guild (server).  
No public hosting or invite link is provided.

**üåê GitHub:** https://github.com/LeSynz/modmail-bot

thread_title: Ticket Bot - An Open Source Easy to Use Discord Bot

messages.raw_content:
üéüÔ∏è What is Ticket Bot?

Ticket Bot is a free, open-source, and fully customizable Discord bot designed to help you easily manage support tickets within your server. Whether you're running a gaming community, offering customer support, or managing applications, Ticket Bot provides a simple and effective solution for organizing and responding to user inquiries.

üí° Key Features:
Completely Free ‚Äì No hidden fees, subscriptions, or premium versions.

Open Source ‚Äì Built for the community. You can view, modify, and contribute to the source code.

Easy to Customize ‚Äì From ticket categories to embed messages, Ticket Bot is simple to tweak for your server‚Äôs needs.

Quick Setup ‚Äì All installation and configuration steps are clearly documented on the GitHub repository.

üì¶ Get Started:
Setting up the bot is quick and painless. Just head over to the official repository and follow the step-by-step guide:
üëâ [Ticket Bot on GitHub](https://github.com/Pontikaki34/Ticket-Bot-Discord)

üîß Make It Your Own:
You‚Äôre encouraged to clone, modify, and build upon this project. Whether you're a developer looking to improve functionality or a server admin wanting to tailor the bot to your community, the code is yours to explore.

thread_title: Welcome Wizard Source Code ‚Äî Self-Hosted Welcome Bot on GitHub

messages.raw_content:
Want a simple greeting bot for your server?
**Welcome Wizard** is now *open-source* ‚Äî easy to set up, clean codebase, and beginner-friendly.

## Features:
* Sends a stylish embed message in DMs when a user joins
* Tracks down invites and it saves them in a local file
* Shows invites statistics
* Send a tracking message for joins/leaves in a specified channel

> You can easily customize it

# üì¢ Welcome to the <#1287448157466398791> ‚Äî where anyone can showcase their bot at no cost.

## üßæ How It Works
This forum is open to **any member** who wants to promote their bot for free.
Just create a post using the **template below** and tag it properly.

---

## üß© Posting Guidelines
1. **Use a clear title** (bot name or core function).
2. **Include a description** highlighting what your bot does.
3. **List key features** in bullet points (what makes it special?).
4. **Attach a thumbnail** to make your post pop. (Ideal size: 1280x780 px)
4. **Include your bot‚Äôs invite link.**

---

## üè∑Ô∏è Tag It Right
Select up to **5 tags** that describe your bot (e.g., Music, Moderation, Utility, etc.).

---

## üö´ Rules
* **NSFW, scam, nuke, crypto,** and **malware bots** are **strictly prohibited.**
* **No reposting** the same bot over and over. One active listing per bot.
* Keep your posts respectful, honest, and clear.

### ‚ö†Ô∏è Violators may be warned, muted, or banned depending on the case.

---

thread_title: No Minors - Protecting Children From Predators

messages.raw_content:
**[No Minors](https://nominors.xyz/)** ‚Äì Protecting Children from Online Predators

Join the fight against online child exploitation by implementing comprehensive age verification that automatically prevents minors from accessing adult Discord servers.

**‚ú® Features:**

* Automated detection and removal of underage users
* Real-time protection against potential grooming attempts
* Comprehensive logging and transparency systems
* Community-driven safety database with 15,000+ tracked minors
* Professional webhook management for notifications
* Protecting 63,000+ users across participating servers

**Why It Matters:** Every server that properly enforces age restrictions creates a safer internet for children. By preventing minors from accessing inappropriate spaces, you're actively contributing to child safety and reducing opportunities for predatory behavior online.

**How It Works:** Join our support server and request bot setup for your community. Our team provides professional configuration and ongoing support to ensure maximum protection for your server.

Made by: [Synz](https://synz.xyz/)

thread_title: Synz Tickets - Your All-In-One Ticket Bot

messages.raw_content:
Synz Tickets is the first dedicated ticket bot that I have ever made, It hasn't had alot of testing done however it is in a fully complete state.

## Features
* Fully configurable via `/config`
* Button based ticket system
* Full logging system - Staff Actions, Transcripts
* Fully customisable ticket panels and responses

## Command List
* `/config` - View/edit the bots config and create ticket panels and types (Admin)
* `/close` - When used in a ticket channel this will initiate the closing process like the button would
* `/help` - Detailed help command

Any issues found just send me a DM and I'll get to them ASAP.

**Made by:** [Synz](https://synz.xyz/)
**Bot Invite:** https://discord.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=1400203535941107733
